project_descr: Sustainable Microfinance to Improve the Livelihoods of the Poor.

outputs.output_descr: The poor and vunerable households have increased income and improvement in living conditions by having sustainable access to institutional and community group manged financial services at affordable rates and appropriate terms and coinditions.

donor_name: UNITED STATES AGENCY FOR INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT (USAID)
